mapper.select:
SELECT I.INSP_CD, I.INSP_NM, I.OCS_CD, E.EMR_NM AS OCS_NM, I.RSLT_DEPT_CD, FN_CM_CODENAME('SC036',I.RSLT_DEPT_CD) AS RSLT_DEPT_NM, I.OCS_DIV_CD, I.AMT, I.USE_YN FROM SC_INSP I, SC_EMR_CODE E WHERE I.OCS_CD = E.EMR_CD
AND INSP_CD LIKE '%'||#{inspCd}||'%'
AND INSP_NM LIKE '%'||#{inspNm}||'%'
ORDER BY INSP_CD
SELECT CI.RSVT_NO, CI.INSP_CD, I.INSP_NM, CI.QNT, CI.AMT, CI.INSP_PLN_DATE, CI.REG_ID, CI.REG_IP, CI.REG_DATE FROM SC_CHO_INSP CI, SC_INSP I WHERE CI.INSP_CD=I.INSP_CD AND RSVT_NO = #{rsvtNo}

SELECT I.INSP_CD, I.INSP_NM, I.OCS_CD,E.EMR_NM AS OCS_NM, AMT, I.RSLT_DEPT_CD, USE_YN, OCS_DIV_CD, FN_CM_CODENAME('SC036',I.RSLT_DEPT_CD) FROM SC_INSP I,SC_EMR_CODE E WHERE INSP_CD NOT IN(SELECT INSP_CD FROM SC_CHO_INSP WHERE RSVT_NO = #{rsvtNo}) AND I.OCS_CD = E.EMR_CD AND I.USE_YN = #{useYn}

SELECT EMR_CD AS code, EMR_NM AS codeName FROM SC_EMR_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND (EMR_CD LIKE '%'||#{ocs}||'%' OR EMR_NM LIKE '%'||#{ocs}||'%')
AND EMR_CD LIKE 'SH%'
AND DEPT_CD = #{rsltDeptCd}
AND DEPT_CD is null AND EMR_CD not LIKE 'SH%'
mapper.update: UPDATE SC_INSP SET INSP_NM = #{inspNm}, OCS_CD = #{ocsCd}, RSLT_DEPT_CD = #{rsltDeptCd}, OCS_DIV_CD = #{ocsDivCd}, AMT = #{amt}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, MOD_ID = #{userId}, MOD_IP = #{userIp}, MOD_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE INSP_CD = #{inspCd}

INSERT INTO SC_INSP ( INSP_CD, INSP_NM, OCS_CD, RSLT_DEPT_CD, OCS_DIV_CD, AMT, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_IP, REG_DATE ) VALUES( #{inspCd}, #{inspNm}, #{ocsCd}, #{rsltDeptCd}, #{ocsDivCd}, #{amt}, #{useYn}, #{userId}, #{userIp}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))

MERGE INTO SC_CHO_INSP USING DUAL ON (RSVT_NO = #{rsvtNo} AND INSP_CD = #{inspCd}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( RSVT_NO, INSP_CD, QNT, AMT, INSP_PLN_DATE ) VALUES ( #{rsvtNo}, #{inspCd}, #{qnt}, #{amt}, #{inspPlnDate} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SC_CHO_INSP WHERE RSVT_NO =#{rsvtNo} AND INSP_CD =#{inspCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE SC_CHO_INSP SET QNT =#{qnt}, AMT =#{amt}, INSP_PLN_DATE = #{inspPlnDate} WHERE RSVT_NO = #{rsvtNo} AND INSP_CD = #{inspCd}
